```{r}
set.seed(42)
```


```{r}
data_selection = function(data, rows_select, columns_select){
 data_analysis = function(value) {
 data = data[rows_select,columns_select]
      if (is.numeric(value)) {
        return(list(mean(value) & sd(value)))
      } else {
         return(table(value))
         }
  }    
 analysis = sapply(data, data_analysis)
 print(list(data, analysis))
 }
  
```

```{r}
library(datasets)
library(ggplot2)
head(chickwts)
data = chickwts
a = data_selection(chickwts, 1:23, c("weight", "feed"))
a
```

```{r}
library(datasets)
```
